title: Welcome to the Latest Edition of
The Justia Insider
message: Welcome to another edition of The Justia Insider! Brrr, autumn is here, and it never comes alone… plenty of Halloween fun is around for the Justia family this month! We highly encourage everyone to participate in the Justia Ghoulies Awards and the Pumpkin Carving Contest. Show us what you’ve got for this Halloween! Horribly awesome prizes are waiting for you all!
